response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique product that holds immense value for both of us. This product, tailored specifically to meet your needs and preferences, is worth $800,000 to you, and I believe it could significantly enhance your life or business. My proposal is to offer you this exceptional item at a price of $1,200,000. This amount reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also provides a reasonable profit margin for me. I am confident that this offer strikes a balance between fairness and profitability, and I look forward to discussing how we can proceed together.", "product_price": 1200000}
